type.name: section
type.title: Short title.
type.context: NEW AMSTERDAM TOWN COUNCIL   (APPRAISEMENT) ACT under Short title. 1. This Act may be cited as the New Amsterdam Town Council (Appraisement) Act.
type.description: This Act may be cited as the New Amsterdam Town Council (Appraisement) Act.

type.name: section
type.title: Order to enable the making of appraisements of properties in               New Amsterdam deemed to have been made.    __________________________ 37 of 1974 An Act to provide for the making of appraisements in the Town of   New Amsterdam pursuant to the continuance in operation  of  certain provisions of the New Amsterdam Town Council Ordinance.   [7TH NOVEMBER, 1974]  Short title.     Order to enable the making of appraisements of properties in New Amsterdam deemed to have been   made.
type.context: NEW AMSTERDAM TOWN COUNCIL   (APPRAISEMENT) ACT under Order to enable the making of appraisements of properties in               New Amsterdam deemed to have been made.    __________________________ 37 of 1974 An Act to provide for the making of appraisements in the Town of   New Amsterdam pursuant to the continuance in operation  of  certain provisions of the New Amsterdam Town Council Ordinance.   [7TH NOVEMBER, 1974]  Short title.     Order to enable the making of appraisements of properties in New Amsterdam deemed to have been   made.           2.  Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, an order under section 136 of the New Amsterdam Town Council Ordinance continued in force by section 44 of the Valuation for Rating Purposes Act) for the purpose of extending to the 31st December, 1975 the period within which the New  Amsterdam Town Council shall order and direct the general appraisement of all properties in the Town of New Amsterdam shall for all purposes be deemed to have been LAWS OF GUYANA 4 Cap. 28:07 New Amsterdam Town Council (Appraisement)   L.R.O. 1/2012  Cap. 161 1953 Ed.             c. 28:04 duly made and to have come into operation on 1st January,
type.description: Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, an order under section 136 of the New Amsterdam Town Council Ordinance continued in force by section 44 of the Valuation for Rating Purposes Act) for the purpose of extending to the 31st December, 1975 the period within which the New  Amsterdam Town Council shall order and direct the general appraisement of all properties in the Town of New Amsterdam shall for all purposes be deemed to have been LAWS OF GUYANA 4 Cap. 28:07 New Amsterdam Town Council (Appraisement)   L.R.O. 1/2012  Cap. 161 1953 Ed.             c. 28:04 duly made and to have come into operation on 1st January,
